column4: relax guys, i'm trying to get priscila to talk in private or something. lets not refuse someone help just cause they can't speak english or find another channel, alright? just gimme a sec here
what are you talking about? i've given priscila the right channel repeatedly: it's #ubuntu-br, full of portuguese-speaking people. *this* channel is english-only.
i havent seen you link to that channel.
it was given only three times
